ðŸ“– Summary: The pingerr repository provides a DNS benchmarking tool that tests over 60 public DNS servers to identify the fastest and most reliable DNS resolver for a given network. It performs multiple test iterations, analyzes DNS-ping correlation, and uses a smart scoring system to provide configuration recommendations.
